name: Resident Evil 4 / Biohazard 4
content:
game:
  appid: 254700
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 32bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    description: Changing to Windows xp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47 xact ffdshow
    arch: win32
    description: Installing d3dcompiler_47, xact and ffdshow...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  esync: true
  version: tkg-re4-4.5-x86_64
